example.eg: The owner of the stately home granted entry to the public at the weekends.
example.egtrans: 那座堂皇宅邸的拥有者准许公众在周末来参观。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 进入权，进入许可, 准许进入

example.eg: Tom was always cheerful and his entry lightened the atmosphere in the room.
example.egtrans: 汤姆总是很欢快，他的到来，让屋子里的气氛明快了些。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 进入，入场，到来, 登场

example.eg: I see there are two entries in the database for Mr. Smith; we need to delete one of them.
example.egtrans: 我见数据库里有两条史密斯先生的条目；我们得删除一条。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 登录项, 输入项, 条目

example.eg: My English dictionary lists hundreds of senses under the entry for "go".
example.egtrans: 我的英语字典里“go”这个词有好几百种意义。

example.eg: Rick's entry won the art competition.
example.egtrans: 瑞克的参赛作品赢得了艺术比赛。

example.eg: Pippa waited by the entry for Mark to come out.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 入口处, 大门, 门口

example.eg: Data entry is a boring job and doesn't pay well.
Visitors are charged an entrance fee of €2.50.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 报名表格, 参赛申请表

example.eg: An accountant employed by our firm at entry level can expect to earn $50,000 a year.
Most college graduates start with an entry-level job, but hope for a quick promotion.
This is an entry-level instrument suitable for beginners.
The entry point of the bullet is below the exit wound suggesting that a short person fired the gun at Mr. Jones.
The easiest way to get a visa is on arrival, either at airports or at entry points to the country.
His last journal entry is dated 18th December, two days before his untimely death.
Dennis made an entry in his diary.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 少年男女之间的恋爱, 早年的初恋

example.eg: A No Entry sign indicates that cars must not drive down that road.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 禁止进入, 禁止入内, 不得进入
重新入境, 重返, 再返

example.eg: As I'm the owner, I have the right of entry on the property.
